channel.title: HELP plz
channel.description: [b]i need HELP[/b] hardcore when i click play the server thing it comes up with the game thing but then it disappears!!! plz help!!!

item.title: HELP plz
item.dc:creator: @killer0mage1 killer0mage1
item.description:
@killer0mage1 wrote:

[quote=“idontknoww, post:6, topic:250004”]Don’t get a new run. Right click your Run.bat and click edit. Go to the end of the last line and hit enter to where you start a new line and add this:

@pause

Your welcome :)[/quote]
dont you just mean pause
my one already says
@echo off
title Running Bot
java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar; Bot 0
::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem, another 0 to make the song not startup
pause

Read full topic

item.title: HELP plz
item.dc:creator: @pickinsscape pickinsscape
item.description:
@pickinsscape wrote:

I also have the problem, i get an error that comes up with this:

admin has signed onto server. java.net.SocketException: Software caused conection abort: recd failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0<Native Method> at java.net.SocketInputStream.read<Unknown Source> at java.net.SocketInputStream.read<Unknown Source> at client.packetProvess<client.java:13160> at client.process<client.java:13144> at PlayerHandler.process<PlayerHAndler.java:136> at server.main<server.java:45> Game saved for player admin ClientHandler: Client admin disonnected.

I’m using testscape source, hope this is enough information

Read full topic

item.title: HELP plz
item.dc:creator: @idontknoww idontknoww
item.description:
@idontknoww wrote:

Don’t get a new run. Right click your Run.bat and click edit. Go to the end of the last line and hit enter to where you start a new line and add this:

@pause

Your welcome
